title: Ashland Residence / Dimster Architecture
description: Ashland is a single-family residence perched atop a hill overlooking the Santa Monica Bay. The corner lot provided unique opportunities for design and orientation. The L-shaped scheme maximizes privacy towards the streets while exposing the interior to the garden and afternoon sun, encouraging indoor/outdoor living.
author: Valeria Silva

title: Tile Chapel / Jimenez Arquitectos + FB+ estudio
description: The task consists of building a new chapel in the Taquil cemetery, where an annual mass will be held in honor of the deceased. The project will be managed by the parish priest, the syndics, and the community.

title: A Modern Home That Makes Space For An Art Gallery
description: Alterstudio Architecture has shared photos of a new home they completed in Dallas, Texas, with a three-level design that creates a unique environment for family and art. A low berm of rocks planted with native grasses, cacti, and shrubs separates the residence from the street. A limestone bar hovers precariously at the building line, bends […]
author: Erin

title: This Horizontal Home Has Its Structure On Display
description: Brengues Le Pavec architectes has shared photos of a home they completed in Herault, France, that overlooks the valley. The home has floor-to-ceiling windows to take advantage of the views, while a rectangular swimming pool embellishes the house to the south. A large covered terrace allows wraps around the house, expanding the living areas, and […]

title: Ten notable projects by 2025 Royal Gold Medal-winner SANAA
description: Following the Royal Institute of British Architects' announcement that the founders of Japanese studio SANAA have won the 2025 Royal Gold Medal, we spotlight 10 of the duo's most interesting projects. title: SANAA wins 2025 RIBA Royal Gold Medal
description: Japanese studio SANAA, which is led by Kazuyo Sejima and Ryue Nishizawa, has been awarded the 2025 Royal Gold Medal by the Royal Institute of British Architects.
